data.text: @chelsofthewest @65PinkRoses well, richard is an adult so he might have a better idea what to do anyway

@kaitybrady @chelsofthewest Oooo that’s smart! I’ll give them a call thank you! The last pharmacy we called suggested we try our GP and I have a virtual appointment with my family doctor (I see my clinic more often than them tho lol) to see if she can give me one of the 10 vaccines the clinic has lol

@65PinkRoses @chelsofthewest Exactly, or at least get you on a standby list! I got mine through East Toronto health team as a home care patient, which is linked to a hospital, so you might want to see if there’s any online pre registration things at your closest hospital too!

@kaitybrady @chelsofthewest Bless! I just reached out 💖 like the advice ppl keep giving me (including my clinic) is to continue calling pharmacies until I find one with a manager willing to bend the guidelines so any lead on pharmacies to call will be great! Thanks for the help ladies 🥰
@chelsofthewest @kaitybrady You commented on this post so I’m guessing Richard is the person I should ask lol ! https://t.co/c3CSxyNE9l

@kaitybrady @chelsofthewest Thank you!!!! I need to be more active on Facebook ☠️ I’m more of a Insta/Twitter creature by nature. I just found the post and I’ll reach out to ask them about it!!! 🥰 maybe they’ll have advice 😅
@chelsofthewest @65PinkRoses It was on Ana’s post in Get Loud group
@chelsofthewest My dad was like maybe you can come to my appointment and then I’ll refuse and we can be like “oh noooo a wasted vaccine...why not give it to my vulnerable daughter??” lol 😂

@chelsofthewest We’re they Indigenous/First Nations? Bc I know that the age minimum is lowered to 18 for them if you also have a priority 1 condition (CF counts). Otherwise it’s for over 50? We’re calling CFF MB to see if they have any guidance...my CF clinic couldnt help 🥲

@chelsofthewest YAY! My dad booked his today but we have no idea when I’ll get mine bc MB is doing it by age group??? He’s been trying to ask if they can give me his lol like everyone understands it doesn’t make sense how rollout is happening
